Exclude from review files matching the glob pattern `*test*/**`.

When performing a code review, carefully check the code against the guidelines in [clean-code-guidelines.md](../docs/clean-code-guidelines.md). For each violation you find, flag it and suggest a possible fix. Prioritize issues related to security and correctness over style or minor issues.

When performing a code review and the code is JavaScript or Typescript check the code against the guidelines in [javascript-guidelines.md](../docs/javascript-guidelines.md). For each violation you find, flag it and suggest a possible fix.
